name: aaaaaDebugger Stops Mods Loading
description: if there's a debugger only your mods load wow (or at least it tries its hardest)

devs.name: Dev IDs Whitelist
devs.description: List of dev ids to load mods from - separated by commas (not comma space!).

mods.name: Mod IDs Whitelist
mods.description: List of mod ids to load mods from - separated by commas (not comma space!).

mods-blacklist.name: Mod IDs Blacklist
mods-blacklist.description: List of mod ids to <cr>never</c> load mods from - separated by commas (not comma space!).
